text: Ohe yara imana enecha! Tomara n'yayabicarera drrha pratisthata ha'o, allahâ€Œra uddesye saksyadata ha'o, yadi'o ta tomadera nijedera birud'dhe yaya athaba pita-matara o nikata-aâ€Œtmiyera, se dhani hoka athaba gariba, -- kenana allah tadera ubhayera besi nikatabarti. Kaje'i kamanara anubarti hayo na pache tomara bhrasta ha'o. Ara yadi tomara bikrta karo athaba phire ya'o, tabe nihsandeha tomara ya karo allah hacchena tara purna oyakiphahala.
